title: Milk powder prices increased
body_lines: The Milk Powder Importers’ Association increased the price of 400g imported milk powder with immediate effect.
They said the decision was taken due to the increase in prices in the world market.
Accordingly, the price 400g packet, which was at Rs. 540, will be increased by Rs. 250, and the new selling price will be Rs.790, they said. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
